message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I think you'd really appreciate. I'm offering it to you for $13,500.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get closer to my asking price. How about $12,750? It's a fair compromise considering the value of the product.
Thank you for your response, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to stick to $12,000 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
